review: I visited Dr Chitra for my pregnancy checkups. She is a wonderful doctor, always calm and composed. She understands the patient and answers every question:) I felt I was in safe hands. Delivered a healthy baby just by following her instructions.

She is very calm ,caring and friendly.and i had pleasant experience during my visit.she listened my problems and answered all my questions.i strongly recommend Dr chithra.she is the best gynaecologist in the area

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is a boon to have have doctors like Dr. Chitra. She understands every patient and their anxiety, she is very calm and spends time in counselling and answering every doubt we have. Available on phone and email for urgent queries. Consulted Dr.Chitra for my second pregnancy, had lost first baby at 7th month in my first pregnancy. Unfortunately had a miscarriage in my second pregnancy. While I had lost all hopes of having a baby after two consecutive pregnancy loss, It was Dr. Chitra who gave me confidence that I can have a successful pregnancy and a healthy baby. Recently I gave birth to a baby boy.  Pregnancy was filled with complications plus GDM, while we were under tremendous stress, doctor stood by us and gave us hopes that everything will be fine. Delivered a preterm baby at 36 weeks, doctor took very good care of me, she has a personal touch to every patient. Cannot thank her enough, blessed to have consulted her.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy. We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant,Pregnancy Scan,Post Pregnancy Classes,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I have come across with so many doctors so far in my life but out of all those, a few are really making mark in our mamory for the way they treat us. she is one of those. I was fortunate and thankful to one of my friend who suggested me to approach mam for pregnancy care and delivery. She handle our case very nicely and treated very friendly. Having delivery during this covid pandemic is really very challenging but the way she boost up and keep answering to our concerns over face to face consultation, telephonic call, email are really remarkable. I never felt hegitated to consult her for any kind of queries. In between of our pregnancy, unfortunately my wife got dengue as well but the way she supported us and ensure that the recovery should be faster with right set of treatment is very effective and I really obliged her for the same. Thanks mam for helping us out during entire pregnancy cycle and even after that. There are so many things to mentioned, really appreciated.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy. We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly, always smiling, calm. She treats you like family and takes utmost care. She is very patient to listen all your questions and explains them nicely. In this pandemic times, I was stressed because of my pregnancy and delivery. After consultation I used to feel very relaxed. I had c section and she took good care of me. Thank you Ma’am for making my pregnancy easy for me.
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr.Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy. We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Chitra is a very confident doctor and gives lot of positivity. Before we went to her we were consulting another doctor who told that the nasal bone of the baby was not visible and we should go for abortion. But Dr. Chitra confidently told us that nothing is wrong and she did not even recommend any further test telling confidently our baby will be normal. She does not see any serious issue. I was having gestational diabetes and she took care of me and my baby very well, went for surgery at the right time and with her help I was able to deliver a healthy baby!!! I will definitely recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Chitra for my pregnancy, she was utmost kindly  and always stayed proactive for any symptoms during the 9 months, she helped me have a normal delivery with her team and I had a splendid experience even during the covid times. the hospital and team were very professional and I was very well taken care of. A special mention to the dutiful nurses who guided me on breastfeeding and were available round the clock with an ever smiling face and support. Peadtratician doctors and general physician who visited regularly to ensure both me and baby were safe. Dr sai shankar made us help take informed decision and was very gracious enough. peadratic doctors general physician who came regularly to ensure both me and baby were safe and sound. Altogether we had a beautiful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been seeing Dr. Chitra Sreenivasa Murthy since 2015 & I always had a great experience with her. I always felt comfortable talking to her. She explains everything in detail. She has been very supportive during my pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: No clear communication regarding the procedure and followups* ** **** **** *** ** ******* *** *** ****** *** *** ******* ** * ******** ** there was no chain of command and lack of patient management. The surgery was successful but the hospital management and doctors attitude needs a lot of improvement

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had a very bad experience with this doctor and she always makes us wait for 2 hrs but she won’t be ready wait for her patients not even for 5 mins.We has to visit the doctor whom she had referred in the same hospital.we told will visit her back in 5 mins after showing the report to another doctor she said yes and left without waiting. As a doctor it is her responsibility to explain things from the report but she never explained anything clearly.
